title: Growers Own 50cm Round Plant Saucers – Pack of 2 Heavy Duty Planter Drip Trays. Protect Surfaces from Water Damage & Stains. Weatherproof & Easy to Clean. Durable For Indoor & Outdoor Use. Black
features: PROTECTS SURFACES FROM MOISTURE, STAINS & SCRATCHES – Excess water runoff & soil residue can cause permanent damage to indoor floors or outdoor surfaces. These 50cm plant saucers act as effective & high-capacity drip trays that catch & hold extra water draining from plant pots after routine watering or soil saturation. They also help keep floors clean & free from scratches or stains by creating a protective buffer between the pot & the surface. Top Dia: 52cm | Bottom Dia: 47.5cm (Pack of 2)

MAINTAINS OPTIMAL HYDRATION FOR HEALTHIER ROOTS – Overwatering or poor drainage often leads to root rot, plant stress & stunted growth. These flower saucers feature a wide catchment zone that holds just enough water at the base to maintain healthy moisture levels without waterlogging. By sustaining a stable reservoir beneath each pot, our planter trays help minimise evaporation, prevent oversaturation & support consistent root-zone hydration for stronger roots & better long-term plant health.

DURABLE & WEATHER-RESISTANT MATERIAL – Made from high-grade polypropylene (PP), these plant pot saucers resist warping, cracking, and UV damage. Designed for strength and minimal flex, they handle daily use and changing weather with ease. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use, their impact-resistant build ensures reliable performance season after season, offering a long-lasting solution for all your gardening needs.

EASY TO CLEAN & REUSE – Traditional plant drainage trays can accumulate grime, stains & mineral buildup over time. These plant pot bases feature a smooth, non-porous polypropylene surface that resists residue adhesion, making them quick to rinse, wipe down & reuse. Designed for repetitive use with minimal upkeep, they simplify plant care for busy hobbyists & commercial growers. From watering to clean-up, our pot saucers help you maintain a tidy, efficient, & professional growing space.

SUITABLE FOR HOME GARDENS, GREENHOUSES & MORE — Mismatched protective pot trays can ruin your aesthetic or limit your potting options. These round plant pot bases feature a subtle black colour finish & universal sizing that seamlessly matches most planters. Ideal for home gardens, greenhouses or commercial horticulture use, they integrate effortlessly into any plant setup. Available in five (5) precision-moulded sizes to accommodate everything from compact herbs to large ornamental containers.
description: Heavy-Duty Plant Saucers in 5 Sizes & Multiple Packs Water damage, messy spills & ill-fitting trays can quickly ruin your floors or plant setup. These precision-moulded plant saucers are designed to catch runoff & protect surfaces from stains, scratches & oversaturation. Available in five sizes—30cm, 35cm, 40cm, 45cm & 50cm—and a range of convenient pack options (2, 4, 6 & 12), they provide a reliable base for pots of all shapes & sizes—from compact herbs to large ornamental planters. Reliable Moisture Control for Healthy Plants Overwatering, poor drainage & inconsistent moisture can weaken root systems and stunt growth. These saucers create a stable hydration reservoir beneath each pot, helping regulate moisture levels while preventing waterlogging. The wide catchment zone supports root health naturally—minimising evaporation, preventing dry-outs, and reducing the risk of rot, mildew or plant stress. Crack-Resistant & Built to Last Flimsy or brittle saucers often warp, crack or break under daily use or outdoor exposure. These robust trays are moulded from high-grade polypropylene (PP) for enhanced durability & strength. UV-resistant, pressure-resistant & impact-tested, they offer dependable year-round performance in both indoor & outdoor growing environments. Sleek, Low-Maintenance Design Dirty, discoloured trays can ruin your aesthetic and become a chore to clean. These saucers feature a smooth, non-porous finish that resists stains, grime & mineral build-up—making them quick to rinse & reuse. The minimalist black colour blends seamlessly with most décor & planter styles, making them ideal for greenhouses, patios, balconies & commercial spaces.
